attributes.action: Make healthy food e.g fruits, veg & salad cheaper to buy than unhealthy food.
attributes.background:
Salads are more expensive than burgers and fast food meals. Fruit is more expensive than chocolates and sweets. 
Lowering the price on healthy food will increase the amount of people eating healthy as it will be affordable. Many people eat unhealthy foods as it is seen as the cheaper option.
